data.author: Vincent Yen

changelog.release_notes:
* add configuration screen 
* add disconnect vibration
* add background color change

* now with 53 heroes!
* some background color fixed.

data.description:
50+ classic NES heroes in your Pebble Time! (*)

* Change random heroes every minute.
* Shake your pebble to get new hero.
* Low battery (50%,30%) and Disconnect warning.
* Change colors background or black background.
* More heroes will come in next release!

(include Mario, Zelda, Megaman, Double Dragon, Ninja Gaiden, Castlevania, Dig Dug, Donkey Kong, Final Fantasy, Kirby, Kung Fu, Bomber man, Dragonball, Adventure Island, Balloon Fight, Galaxian, Metroid, Goonies, Battletoads, Spy, Pacman, Gradius, TMNT, TwinBee, Urban Champion, 1943, Saint Seiya, Punch Out, Duck Tales, Kidi carus, Tennis, Baseball, and more from Nintendo Famicom......) 

超過50個紅白機的經典角色, 隨機出現在你的錶盤上! 帶你回到歡樂的童年時光!

* 每分鐘都會換一個經典英雄角色.
* 甩動你的手錶, 就可以立即更新角色.
* 低電量提示與藍牙斷線提示.
* 下個版本會有更多角色, 敬請期待!

latest_release.release_notes:
* add configuration screen 
* add disconnect vibration
* add background color change

data.title: 8 bit NES Heroes
